1347.封印がかけられ|中が読めない|気になる本: A strange book|that is sealed|and unreadable.

1349.古代エルフたちが|薬の材料とした|気味の悪い化石: Fossils used by|ancient elves|to make potions.

1365.昔レーンの村に|住んでいた人の|名前が書かれた紙: A tablet with a|list of past|Lane villagers.

1367.魔物に盗まれた|祈りの宿のカギ束|日記のカギつき: Keys to church|and diary that|demons stole.

1370.ソーミャの両親が|ソーミャに宛てて|残した手紙: A letter left|by Somya's|parents to her.

1415.大いなるチカラを|つかさどる|ちいさな賢人: A small wiseman|who controls|a great power.

1416.至上の愛を|つかさどる|ちいさな賢人: A small wiseman|in charge of|supreme love.

1418.無限の光を|つかさどる|ちいさな賢人: A small wiseman|in charge of|infinite light.

1426.亡霊兵士が|落としていった|朽ちはてた本: A decaying book|dropped by a|ghost soldier.

1438.まっ黒なのに|キラキラかがやく|魔法のインク: Magic ink shines|even though it's|pitch black.

1444.かつて桜だった|ふゆうじゅが|咲かせていた花: Flowers that|used to be on|a cherry tree.

1446.ばくだん岩の|中から出てきた|紅くかがやく石: Shiny red stone|that came from|a Rockbomb.

1452.海の彼方から|流れ着くという|漂流する青い石: A blue stone|that drifted|from the sea.

1461.謎の半球体から|採取されたかけら|意外とやわらかい: A piece from a|strange sphere|that's soft.

1473.今のところ|特に使い道のない|金属の鉱石: Metal ore that|has no specific|use right now.

1480.剣岩にある|巨大剣から採れた|年代物のサビ: Rust from a|giant sword|in a rock.

1484.黒い宝箱を|開けられる|役に立つカギ: A useful key|that can open|black chests.

1486.風のチカラを|たくわえる|不思議な花: A flower that |has the power |of the wind.

1510.強力なトゲトゲが|汚れを残さない|おそうじ用の棒: A rod with|spiky ends for|cleaning messes.

1514.うす紫の小さな花|花言葉は|「君を忘れない」: A flower gift|meaning "I will|not forget you"

1521.大いなる災厄と|戦う者であると|示してくれる証: A token showing|you will fight|against evil.

1524.クセのある|珍味と名高い|大きな果実: A large fruit|famed as a|unique delicacy.

1526.魔法の迷宮への|扉を開く|不思議なカギ: Key that opens|the door to the|Magic Maze.

1527.ちいさなメダルの|原料に使われた|めずらしい金属: Rare metal used|as raw material|for Mini Medals.

1533.ツスクル平野の|亡霊の姿を写した|心霊写真: Photo of a |ghost taken in |Tsusukul Plains

1535.ラニアッカの山に|見事に並んだ|大きな顔の写真: Big face photo|taken on a hill|at Raniakka.

1548.ジャングルに|自生する|あざやかな緑の葉: Bright green|leaf that grows|in the jungle.

1614.職人ボルターが|息子のトートに|遺した手紙: Letter left by|Crafter Bolter|to his son Toto.

1615.職人ボルターが|求めていた|とても丈夫な皮: A tough hide|that Bolter|was looking for.

1616.ドルボードに|記された文字を|書き写したメモ: Note with the|words written|on the dolboard.

1631.リン姫が作った|黄昏の果実入り|だいふく: A dusk fruit|sweet made by|Princess Lin.

1663.海風を織り込んだ|希少な絹を用いて|作られたふくろ: A bag made of|rare silk with|sea breeze.

1664.尽きることのない|強力な磁力を放つ|永久磁石: Infinite magnet that|emits a powerful|magnetic force.

1686.どうぐ使いにだけ|所持が許される|特製のカギ: Special key only|ITM are allowed|to possess.

1694.レンダーシアへの|乗船パスと|交換できる券: A voucher for a|boarding pass|to Lendersia.

1695.レンダーシアへ|向かう船に乗れる|貴重なパス: A valuable pass|to board a ship|to Lendersia.

1910.海岸遺跡の|扉を開くという|古いカギ: An old key to|open the coastal|ruins' door.

1928.様々な衣装や色を|試して確認できる|不思議な姿見: Use to try out|various outfits|and colors.

2141.ムストの町の|民家で見つけた|ナゾの巻物: Scroll found in|a house in the|town of Must.

2144.ムストの町にいた|錬金術で創られた|ナゾの魔法生物: A creature made|by magic in|the town of Must

2292.幻魔の大好物|霊力を秘めた|まんじゅう: A sweet with|spiritual power|ate by spirits.

2425.ネコの魔物が|隠し持っていた|色あざやかな実: A colorful|fruit hidden by|a cat monster.

2462.ピィピのお宿で|発掘された|古びた石版: Old stone tablet|excavated at Pipi's Inn

2779.<pc>は タコツキ貝を|耳に当ててみた。<br>|海の音が 聞こえる……ような: <pc> held the Octopus Shell up to their ear.|I felt like I could hear the sea waves...

2984.<pc>は マスターキーを|かかげてみた。|<br>|どうぐ使いとしてのプライド: <pc> held up the Master Key. You felt proud|of yourself as an Item Master.

3069.<pc>は 大とうぞくのカギを|かかげてみた。|<br>|大とうぞくのカギは キ:
held the Great Thief's Key in their|hand.|
|The key has a nice shine to it.

3077.<pc>は じごくのヤスリを|指先で なでてみた。|<br>|魂まで削れてしまい:
stroked their fingertips with|the Hell's File.|
|You feel a spine tingling sensation after|touching the file's jagged surface that|seemed to file even your soul...

3129.<pc>は 折れ曲がった剣を|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|何か 大きなチ:
took a close look at the|Bent Sword.|
|The tip of the sword is bent, as if it struck|something with great force.

3131.<pc>は デゼルのアザの写真を|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|デゼルの左:
looked closely at the photo|of Dezel's birthmark.|
|The pupil-shaped mark on Dezel's left hand was|disturbing to look at... You've never seen|anything like it.

3133.<pc>は 晩さん会の写真を|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|楽しそうに 食:
took a close look at the|Dinner Party Photo.|
|Samon and Felner are eating and enjoying|themselves, while Jade is shown serving|behind them.

3135.<pc>は フェルナーのメモを|確認してみた。|<br>|デゼル・マクフォール:
checked Felner's Notes.|
|Dezel McFaul. 18 years old. Male. Time of|Death: Between midnight & early next morning.|Cause of Death: Struck in the head.|
|Note: Two wounds can be seen on his head.

3136.<pc>は デゼルの手紙を 読んでみた。|<br>|深夜 皆が眠りについた頃 |:
started reading Dezel's Letter.|
|"Late at night, when everyone's asleep...|I wait in front of the Unseen Room. I want to|talk to you about the demon's gaze."

3138.<pc>は 短くなったロウソクを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|誰かが 長:
looked closely at the Shortened|Candle.|
|It's short due to someone using it for|quite a long time.

3140.<pc>は 小さな陶器の破片を|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|赤い陶器は:
looked carefully at the small pottery|shard.|
|This red pottery seems to be very expensive.|You feel like you've seen this material|somewhere before, but where...?

3142.<pc>は 欠けた花びんを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|赤い陶器は とて:
looked carefully at the Chipped|Vase.|
|This red pottery seems to be very expensive.|You feel like you've seen this material|somewhere before, but where...?

3144.<pc>は 赤い花びんを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|開かずの間の前室に:
looked carefully at the|Red Vase.|
|It's an expensive looking red vase that|was displayed in front of the Unseen Room.|There's a small amount of blood on it!

3146.<pc>は カギのチェーンを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|紅玉館の当主が:
took a closer look at the|Key Chain.|
|It seems to be the chain of the key|the head of the Red Jade Mansion always|wore. But the key was nowhere to be found.

3147.<pc>は くだものナイフを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|紅玉館の当主が:
took a closer look at|the Fruit Knife.|
|It seems to be the fruit knife the head|of the Red Jade Mansion used when peeling|apples. There isn't any blood on it.

3148.<pc>は ネネットの日記帳を|読んでみた。|<br>|○月×日 デゼルさまに:
read Nenette's Diary.|
|XX/XX Dezel confessed his love to me! I've|thought about it for a long time! Hehe|No way I'm not taking advantage of this!|
|XX/XX Dezel and I have a secret plan underway...|The key from my master...|I'm looking forward to it!|
|XX/XX Dezel snuck in and accidentally killed |the master. He buried the body behind the|mansion for now, but... what should I do...?|
|XX/XX Dezel is missing and is now pretending|to be the master, but no one seems to notice.|This is too easy!|
|XX/XX But, now I'm in trouble... I have the|key, but I can't seem to find the keyhole|this time...

3149.<pc>は リンゴの皮を|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|しなびて パリパリ:
took a closer look at the|Apple Peel.|
|The skin of a crispy apple is spiraling|leftward from the center.

3150.<pc>は 白い封筒を開けてみた。|<br>|封筒の中には カードが入っており|:
opened the White Envelope.|
|Inside of it, there is a card with a two-line|message in beautiful handwriting.|
|"Even if there are nights that shed as many|tears as there are stars... I'll hold you as many|times as there are stars."

3151.<pc>は 開かずの間のカギを|つかってみた。|<br>|しかし ここでは 何も:
used the Unseen Room Key.|
|But, nothing happened here!

3203.<pc>は 海岸遺跡のカギを|じっくり ながめてみた。|<br>|ぼろぼろの 古:
looked carefully at the Coastal|Ruins Key.|
|It's a shabby, old key. A nametag that|reads "Historica" is tied to it with|a pink string.

3397.<pc>は 鉄の金庫を|ガンガン 殴ってみた。|<br>|鉄の金庫は びくともし:
banged on the Iron Safe.|
|The Iron Safe wasn't scared at all!

3407.<pc>は 鉄の金庫のカギを|かかげてみた。|<br>|鉄の金庫のカギは キラリ:
held the Iron Safe Key.|
|It has a brilliant shine to it.

3628.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵１巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 1 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the real Aztech|Soldier's head contains an artificial|intelligence that allows autonomous behavior.|
|An experiment was conducted where the AI was|used mediate interests between organizations|and to reconcile a husband and wife.|
|For some reason, the former succeeded,|but the latter failed...

3629.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵２巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 2 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the Urbea|Aztech's right arm has a beam cannon that|emits a high powered beam.|
|"The beam was fired at the moon during the|start of the year, and caused a new crater|to form!", observed information says.

3630.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵３巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 3 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the Aztech has a|huge axe attached to its left arm, but can|also be attached with a beam cannon.|
|Aztechs programmed with warlike AI tend to|prefer the axe for close quarters, and the|beam cannon for ranged support.|
|At the front lines where equipment is in short|supply, records say that Aztechs would|fight over one axe until they were destroyed.

3631.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵４巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 4 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the Aztech has a|mysterious space inside it where people can|enter.|
|It seems there was a plan to freeze|and store bodies inside the Aztechs, which|this space is a remnant of.|
|Things like meat and vegetables can last|longer than in room temperature storage by|using this space.|
|There are also Aztechs that specialize in the|transportation of food.

3633.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵５巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 5 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the Aztech's legs|use an anti-gravity technology, and will not|fall on even the roughest roads.|
|The Minister of Finance consulted with the|Imperial Tech Agency and asked, "If they can|float, do they need legs?" to curb war costs.|
|The proposal was a horizontal spear of sorts,|but the Tech Agency immediately abolished the|idea with backlash.|
|The Minster was worried about the loss|of legs, but afterwards he was sent to the|front lines and died honorably in the war...

3635.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵６巻に|付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた|:
read the thin booklet attached to the|box the Weekly Urbea Aztech Vol. 6 was held|in.|
|According to the booklet, the Aztech's legs|use a hovering function to dramatically|shorten travel time.|
|This hovering is useful for retreating battles|if needed. However, malfunctions in AI caused|some to go behind enemy lines and not return.|
|Theories say the fugitive Aztechs are waiting|to take revenge on their creator, who started|an irrational war from the village he built...

3638.<pc>は 磁気式図書購入札を|かるく 折り曲げてみた。|<br>|手をはなすと:
lightly folded the Magnetic|Book Purchase Tag.|
|After letting go, it returned to its original|shape. It's a material that seems to break,|but doesn't actually...

3790.<pc>は 音楽祭のパンフレットを|手に取って ながめてみた。|<br><cen:
picked up the Music Festival|Pamphlet and took a closer look.|
|Ocean City Linjahar Reconstruction|Music Festival!|Will be held at Linjahar Grand Theater!|
|The special guest will be a flower diva|from the... Kingdom of Ethene?!|You don't want to miss this special day!

3804.<pc>は 超音波ハンマーを|手に取って ながめてみた。|<br>|作った人間と:
picked up and looked at the|Ultrasonic Hammer.|
|Just like the person who made it, it looks|simple, but it seems to work well...

3812.<pc>は マイタウン権利証を 開いた。|<br>|うつくしい模様に ふちどられ:
opened the My Town Deed.|
|Your signature is firmly marked on this|beautifully adorned and bordered paper.

4036.<pc>は なけなしのおかねが入った|お財布を 手に取った。|<br>|切実かつ:
picked up the bag with a little bit|of money in it.|
|How sad and desperate....

4038.<pc>は|くれないザクロを 手に取った。|<br>|表面は ツヤツヤとして|甘:
picked up the Crimson Pomegranate.|
|It looks shiny and sweet, and has a sweet|scent too... It looks like it could start|running at any second!

4040.<pc>は|クロッコの全財産が 入った袋を|肩にかついだ。|<br>|ゴールドや:
carried the bag containing all of Crocco's|belongings.|
|It's heavy with gold and jewels...| was afraid their shoulders would get stiff.

4301.<pc>は ショーナへの手紙を|手に取ってみた。|<br>|手紙からは ふわりと:
picked up the Letter to Shauna.|
|The letter has a fluffy, floral scent. It seems|to be soaked in perfume!

4512.<pc>は 魔剣アストロンを|手に取って 思い切り 振るってみた。|<br>|…:
picked up Astoron and tried|swinging it.|
|...it's really heavy and difficult to handle!|Apparently, there's a spell cast on the|sword that limits its usage.

4608.<pc>は 大魔王城１階のカギを|手に取って ながめてみた。|<br>|大魔王城:
picked up the Castle 1F Key and|looked at it.|
|It's a key suitable for the Great Demon Lord's|Castle. felt proud holding it.

4621.<pc>は まじない石を 手に取って|いろんな角度から ながめてみた。|<br>:
held the Spell Stone and looked at|it from various angles.|
|At first glance, it looks like a normal|stone, but on closer inspection, there|shines a faint pattern on the surface.|
|Take it to the pedestal in the|Guardian Hall in the innermost part of|the Decaying Tomb.
